label: XINU Suspicious Token
notes: Mass sending tokens to multiple wallets without a website. High risk scam behavior.

label: KERC Rugpull Risk
notes: One wallet holds 84% of supply. Highly probable future rugpull.

label: XFLASH Stuck Funds Trap
notes: Old hackathon project. User-reported WXDC stuck. Live contract with no fund retrieval mechanism. High risk.
